title: Himalaya Youth Eternity Face Sheet Mask | Healthy hydration | Hyaluronic Acid Serum | 20 sec
description:
Himalaya Youth Eternity Face Sheet Mask are infused with serum made up of hyaluronic acid that hydrates the skin and Edelweiss Plant that helps in fighting premature signs of ageing. These 100% biodegradable sheet masks offer hydration which is worth 1 week’s hydrating serum. Himalaya Sheet Masks are available in 3 more variants Blueberry, Strawberry and Mulethi. Try the Himalaya Sheet Masks for the healthy hydration.

#sheetmask #glassskin #serummask #facesheetmask

title: Himalaya Youth Eternity 20s
description: With Today’s lifestyle one needs a resilient skin care to prevent early signs of ageing. For you, we have hence found a plant of Youth. Edelweiss plant that blooms in the harshest climate of the alps, has powerful anti-ageing properties and Himalaya Youth Eternity range deeply nourishes your skin to give the same skin resilience against early signs of ageing.

title: HIMALAYA LIP BALM | Hindi 35 Seconds
description: Himalaya Lip Balm provides relief from sore and chapped lips, especially during Winter. Enriched with Vitamin E and the oils of Wheat Germ, Carrot, Castor, and Coconut, Himalaya Lip Balm nourishes your lips and protects them against the drying effects of the cold and wind. With a no-touch application design, this handy lip balm keeps your lips soft and beautiful!

title: Himalaya Anti Hair Fall Solution - 6 sec English
description:
Himalaya's Anti-Hair Fall Solution is proven to reduce hair fall. It is enriched with goodness of Bhringraja; an age-old trusted herb that helps promote hair growth and Palasha; that helps reduce hair fall due to breakage. 
Fortified with herbal ingredients our solution is effective and gentle, leaving your hair beautiful and healthy.
